Created new Kerbol.

Some new stars added.

Added new planets orbiting these stars.

Added wormhole near Jool that leads to the Gargantua system. **[WIP]**

@Artyomka15

I just gave a quick test and noticed quite a few errors, though I'd share.

-the black hole has stock sun flare, it glows bright yellow

-nim's corona is pure white (normally this is a file path error)

-sunlight on the Kerbol system's bodies is coming from the black hole, and the side of planets facing Kerbol is recieving no light from Kerbol

-atmosphere settings have been updated a while ago, it's clear you got these from New Horizons or OPM, look at NH's configs for the latest update

-you probably shouldn't edit the system.cfg in the main Kopernicus folder, it breaks compatibility with other packs ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

-after looking over your configs i noticed that you don't actually need to include kittopiatech, as everything it does kopernicus can do (& better)

If you need a hand fixing any of these issues gimme a shout, as I actually made a system just like this a while ago while experimenting so i know alot about fixing up these little errors.

Other than those, so far it's pretty awesome, keep up the good work.
